problem: Given I is the midpoint of EG. I is the midpoint of FH and EG . Complete the proof that GH∥EF . (Elements:  △EFI ,  EI ,  FI ,  ∠GIH ,  ∠EFI ,  ∠GHI ,  GH ,  GI ,  EF ,  ∠EIF ,  HI ,  △GHI , )
statement: I is the midpoint of FH
I is the midpoint of EG
reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
